sentences.english: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.chinese: “全球化”是個泛稱，用以描述增進了的的國際貿易。

sentences.english: Sometimes also used the Pan- Tatar said all ethnic groups in northern China.
sentences.chinese: 有時也用韃靼泛稱中國北方各民族。

sentences.english: Any of various species of cold-blooded vertebrates found worldwide In fresh and salt water.
sentences.chinese: 見於世界淡水或鹹水的各種冷血脊椎動物的泛稱。
